actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to increase the scope of the special bridge replacement program.

summary.text: Expands the special bridge replacement and rehabilitation program to authorize Federal participation in State projects to replace or rehabilitate bridges which are not located on the Federal-aid highway systems. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to inventory such bridges and to classify them according to their serviceability, safety, and essentiality for public use. Bases a State's apportionment for rehabilitation and replacement funding on such classification. Authorizes appropriations through fiscal year 1990 for the special bridge rehabilitation and replacement program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to increase the scope of the special bridge replacement program.
